Description:
Spring Hotel Bequia and the Venue Conference Centre are located on the outskirts of Port Elizabeth, the capital of the island of Bequia in St. Vincent and the Grenadines. In addition to our 17 guest rooms and large indoor/outdoor meeting spaces, guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or at the large poolside bar with magnificent ocean views and breezes. There are many common areas throughout the hotel. If you are looking for St. Vincent and the Grenadines hotels to spend a great time with your friends, family or business associates, Spring Hotel Bequia is your perfect choice. We offer great luxury and comfort with a Caribbean flair to our customers. You can celebrate destination weddings, community gatherings, and participate in learning workshops for all ages. Consider us  for your next Grenadine vacation or meeting.

Free and fast WiFi is available throughout the property, and there is plenty of free private parking available on site. All rooms and the convention centre are fully air-conditioned. Our premium suites are furnished with locally crafted 4-poster beds and hand-made furniture by local craftsmen. All rooms have flat-screen TV. Certain accommodations feature a balcony sitting area with dramatic views of the ocean or pool. Some rooms are limited-mobility accessible. All rooms all include a modern, en-suite bathroom with a custom shower, bathrobes, free toiletries, and a hairdryer provided. Our hotel practices sustainable and green policies. We use solar energy, collect water and recycle to reduce our carbon footprint.

Breakfast may be included depending on your rate plan. There is free airport or ferry terminal shuttle service to/from the hotel.

The nearest airport is Bequia Airport, 3 miles from Spring Hotel Bequia. There are direct flights to Bequia from Barbados.  Kingstown, the capital of St Vincent and the Grenadines, is a 55-minute ferry ride with a larger international airport. The islands of Mustique, and Canouan are nearby, as are the famous Tobago Cays. Payment is also possible by bank transfer. Please contact the property in advance for more information using the contact details provided on your booking confirmation.
